author: Ross Burden
method: Heat the oil in a saucepan over a medium heat. Add the chorizo, celery, garlic and pepper, and cook over a medium heat for two minutes, until the chorizo is browned. Place the tomato seeds and the flesh of two of the tomatoes into a food processor and blend. Add to the pan. Add the remaining ingredients and simmer for five minutes. Serve hot with crusty bread.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  100g/3½oz chorizo, peeled and sliced 1cm thick,  3 tbsp celery, finely chopped,  3 garlic cloves, crushed,  ½ tsp freshly ground black pepper ,  4 tomatoes, deseeded (seeds reserved),  ½ tsp dried oregano,  1 tin cannellini beans, rinsed and drained,  handful black olives, pitted
